title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Reinforcement Learning-Based HVAC Energy Control Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physics and mathematics knowledge, foundational programming understanding, and introduction to energy systems
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Understand reinforcement learning fundamentals and build simulation models applicable to HVAC control systems
Solve energy consumption optimization problems by tuning DQN hyperparameters (learning rate, discount factor, etc.)
Analyze simulation results under various climate conditions to calculate system efficiency (COP) and energy savings rates
Formulate control strategies using real building energy data and visualize results through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
